_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Endstone
author: hello@endstone.dev
description: Endstone is a powerful server software for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. It provides a high-level plugin API that allows server owners to easily add features to the Bedrock Dedicated Servers.
startup: python -m pip install -U pip && pip install -U "{{ENDSTONE_VERSION}}" && python -m endstone -s . -y

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Endstone Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/EndstoneMC/pterodactyl/main/server.properties
fi

export HOME=/mnt/server

echo -e "Installation complete"
exit 0

variables.name: Endstone Version
variables.description:
The version of endstone to download. 

Leave at "endstone" to always get the latest version, or use "endstone==version" to use a specific version.
